wikipedia_page.main: Glyn Lewis is a British professor of psychiatric epidemiology and the current head of the Division of Psychiatry at University College London

response: According to local legend, Joseph of Arimathea landed here with the Christ Child.Clensy, David (2006), Island Life: A History of Looe Island - pp. 15, Lulu.com,  Some scholars, including Glyn Lewis, suggest the island could be Ictis, the location described by Diodorus Siculus as a centre for the tin trade in pre-Roman Britain.
*Glyn Lewis, British professor of psychiatric epidemiology
